Title: Enacts the "hazardous materials transport security act"
Summary: Enacts the "hazardous materials transport security act"; establishes a task force to recommend security devices and systems for motor vehicles used to transport hazardous materials; provides for driver's license verification and two-way communication; provides for insurance reductions.
LawCode: Amd ยง14-f, Transp L; amd ยง27-0305, En Con L; amd ยง375, V & T L; amd ยง2336, Ins L
